hero.title: About Syndik
hero.description: We're dedicated to revolutionizing residential syndicate management through innovative technology, exceptional service, and a deep understanding of community needs.

rtlDemo.title: RTL Support Demo
rtlDemo.description: Switch to Arabic to see RTL (Right-to-Left) layout in action.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower residential syndicates with modern, intuitive tools that simplify property management, enhance transparency, and foster stronger community relationships.
mission.details: We understand the unique challenges facing residential syndicates today, from financial transparency to resident communication. That's why we've built a comprehensive platform that addresses these needs with precision and care.

stats.title: Trusted by Communities Worldwide
stats.description: Our platform has helped hundreds of syndicates manage their properties more efficiently.

features.title: Comprehensive Platform Features
features.description: Everything you need to manage your residential syndicate efficiently and effectively.

financialManagement.name: Financial Management
financialManagement.description: Complete financial tracking and reporting for syndicate operations.

residentPortal.name: Resident Portal
residentPortal.description: Easy-to-use portal for residents to stay connected and informed.

meetingManagement.name: Meeting Management
meetingManagement.description: Streamlined tools for organizing and conducting syndicate meetings.

documentStorage.name: Document Storage
documentStorage.description: Secure cloud storage for all your important syndicate documents.

communicationHub.name: Communication Hub
communicationHub.description: Centralized platform for all syndicate communications.

securityPrivacy.name: Security & Privacy
securityPrivacy.description: Enterprise-grade security with GDPR compliance and data protection.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: The principles that guide everything we do at Syndik.

transparency.name: Transparency
transparency.description: We believe in clear, honest communication and transparent financial management that builds trust within communities.

innovation.name: Innovation
innovation.description: Continuously improving our platform with cutting-edge technology and user feedback to stay ahead of industry needs.

community.name: Community
community.description: Building stronger residential communities through better management tools that foster collaboration and engagement.

excellence.name: Excellence
excellence.description: Committed to delivering the highest quality service and support to our users with 24/7 reliability.

timeline.title: Our Journey
timeline.description: From a simple idea to a comprehensive platform serving thousands of residents.

2019.title: Foundation
2019.description: Syndik was founded with a vision to modernize residential property management.

2020.title: First Launch
2020.description: Released our initial platform serving 50+ syndicates across major cities.

2021.title: Mobile App
2021.description: Launched mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms.

2022.title: Scale & Growth
2022.description: Expanded to serve 200+ syndicates with enhanced financial modules.

2023.title: AI Integration
2023.description: Introduced AI-powered insights and automated reporting features.

2024.title: Global Expansion
2024.description: Reached 500+ syndicates and launched in multiple international markets.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.description: The passionate experts behind Syndik, dedicated to transforming property management.

sarah.name: Sarah Chen
sarah.bio: Former property management executive with 15+ years of industry experience.

michael.name: Michael Rodriguez
michael.bio: Software architect specializing in enterprise SaaS solutions and scalable systems.

emma.name: Emma Thompson
emma.bio: UX expert focused on creating intuitive interfaces for property management.

david.name: David Kim
david.bio: Full-stack developer with expertise in modern web technologies and cloud infrastructure.

propertyInformationUpdates.title: Property Information Updates
propertyInformationUpdates.description: Learn how to keep your property information current and accurate

overview.title: Overview
overview.content: Keeping your property information up-to-date is crucial for effective property management. This guide covers how to update various aspects of your property details.

proTip.title: Pro Tip
proTip.content: Set up monthly reminders to review and update property information to ensure accuracy.

updatingBasicInfo.title: Updating Basic Information
updatingBasicInfo.subtitle: Property Details & Specifications
steps: Navigate to Properties in the main menu
Select the property you want to update

propertyAmenities.title: Property Amenities
propertyAmenities.content: Managing property amenities helps prospective residents understand what your property offers.

important.title: Important Note
important.content: Always keep contact information current as it's used for emergency notifications.

photosDocuments.title: Photos & Documents
photosDocuments.content: Visual content helps residents and prospects better understand your property.

photoUpdates.title: Photo Updates
photoUpdates.content: Regular photo updates showcase your property's current condition and improvements.

moveInMoveOutProcess.title: Move-in/Move-out Process
moveInMoveOutProcess.description: Streamline move-ins and move-outs with comprehensive workflows that ensure smooth transitions for both residents and management.

overview.title: Overview
overview.content: The move-in and move-out process is crucial for maintaining property condition, ensuring tenant satisfaction, and protecting your investment. Syndik provides structured workflows to manage these transitions efficiently.

preMoveIn.title: Pre-Move-in Preparation
steps: Complete final unit cleaning and inspection
Verify all maintenance items are resolved
Prepare welcome packet and unit information
Coordinate key pickup and access setup

moveInDay.title: Move-in Day Tasks
tasks: Document any existing conditions with photos
Collect security deposit and first month's rent

noticeRequirements.title: Notice Requirements
noticeRequirements.content: Ensure proper notice periods are followed according to lease terms and local regulations (typically 30-60 days).

steps.title: Schedule pre-move-out inspection
steps.description: Identify any issues that need attention before final inspection

steps.title: Provide move-out checklist
steps.description: Give residents clear expectations for unit condition requirements

finalInspection.title: Final Inspection
items: Calculate any deductions from security deposit
Collect all keys and access devices
Schedule any necessary repairs or cleaning

digitalDocumentation.title: Digital Documentation
digitalDocumentation.content: All inspection items are automatically saved with timestamps, photos, and inspector notes for complete audit trails.

refundProcess.title: Refund Process
steps: Complete final inspection within required timeframe
Provide itemized deduction list to tenant
Process refund according to local laws
Keep records for required retention period

legalCompliance.title: Legal Compliance
legalCompliance.content: Follow all local and state laws regarding deposit handling, interest calculations, and return timeframes to avoid penalties.

recordKeeping.title: Record Keeping
items: Maintain digital copies of all documents
Store records according to legal requirements
Ensure easy access for future reference

processEfficiency.title: Process Efficiency
items: Implement digital workflows to reduce paperwork

tenantRelations.title: Tenant Relations
items: Respond promptly to questions and concerns
Follow up after moves to ensure satisfaction

successTips.title: Success Tips
items: Create welcome packets for new residents with all essential information
Use video walkthroughs for remote tenants or as backup documentation
Maintain unit turnover schedule to minimize vacancy time
Keep spare keys and access devices properly labeled and secure

paymentReconciliation.description: Match payments with outstanding balances to maintain accurate financial records.

steps.title: Import Bank Statements
steps.description: Upload bank statements to the system for reconciliation

steps.title: Match Transactions
steps.description: Automatically or manually match transactions with payments

steps.description: Investigate and resolve any mismatched transactions

securityCompliance.title: Security & Compliance
securityCompliance.description: Ensure secure and compliant payment processing following industry standards.
securityCompliance.content: Ensuring secure and compliant payment processing.

measures.title: PCI DSS Compliance
measures.description: Maintain Payment Card Industry Data Security Standards compliance.

measures.title: Data Encryption
measures.description: All payment data is encrypted using industry-standard protocols.

measures.title: Secure Transmission
measures.description: Payment information is transmitted through secure, encrypted channels.

measures.title: Audit Trails
measures.description: Comprehensive logging of all payment transactions for accountability.

measures.title: Access Controls
measures.description: Role-based access controls limit payment processing permissions.

issues.solution: Check if the payment was processed during business hours and allow up to 24 hours for bank transfers to appear. Contact support if the payment still doesn't show after this period.
Verify card details are correct and the card has sufficient funds. Some banks may flag rental payments as suspicious - advise tenants to contact their bank if needed.
Check transaction timestamps and reference numbers. If duplicate exists, void one payment and issue refund if necessary. Always verify with bank records before taking action.

issues.problem: Payment amount doesn't match rent due
issues.solution: Review payment allocation and check if partial payments or additional fees were included. Adjust payment application as needed or contact tenant for clarification.

tips: Always verify payment amounts before processing
Keep detailed records of all payment transactions
Set up automated payment reminders to reduce late payments
Regularly reconcile payments with bank statements
Provide clear payment instructions to tenants
Use secure payment processing methods only

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied property managers who trust Syndik.
testimonials.description: Discover how Syndik transforms property management through authentic testimonials from our clients.

reviews.content: Syndik has revolutionized how we manage properties. The intuitive interface and advanced features have saved us precious time.
The platform is excellent for resident management. The self-service portal has significantly improved our customer relations.
The financial and reporting tools are exceptional. We now have complete visibility over our operations.

guarantee.title: 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
guarantee.description: Not satisfied? Get a full refund within 30 days.

hero.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
hero.description: Choose the perfect plan for your syndicate. All plans include our core features with 24/7 support.

pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
pricing.description: Start with our free trial and scale as you grow. No hidden fees, no surprises.

discount.message: Switch to yearly billing and save 20%
discount.yearlyMessage: with yearly billing - that's 2 months free!

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: Perfect for small property managers just getting started.

professional.name: Professional
professional.description: Everything you need to manage medium-sized portfolios efficiently.

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: Advanced features for large-scale property management operations.

allPlansInclude.title: All Plans Include
allPlansInclude.description: Every Syndik plan comes with these essential features to help you manage your syndicate effectively.

items.question: Is there a free trial?
items.answer: Yes! We offer a 14-day free trial for all our plans. No credit card required to get started.

items.question: Can I change plans later?
items.answer: Absolutely. You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes will be reflected in your next billing cycle.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept all major credit cards, bank transfers, and can set up custom payment arrangements for enterprise customers.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Yes, we use enterprise-grade security measures including encryption, regular backups, and comply with all data protection regulations.

items.question: Do you offer discounts for annual billing?
items.answer: Yes, we offer a 20% discount when you choose annual billing for any of our plans.

enterpriseSecurity.title: Enterprise Security
enterpriseSecurity.description: Advanced security features and compliance for large organizations.

globalAvailability.title: Global Availability
globalAvailability.description: Available worldwide with multi-language and multi-currency support.

dedicatedSupport.title: Dedicated Support
dedicatedSupport.description: Get priority support with dedicated account management.

awardWinning.title: Award-winning Solution
awardWinning.description: Recognized as the best property management platform by the industry.

customSolution.title: Need a Custom Solution?

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Privacy & Data Protection
privacy.readCarefully: We're committed to protecting your privacy and being transparent about how we handle your data.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Syndik ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our residential syndicate management platform.

informationCollect.title: 2. Information We Collect
informationCollect.personalInfoContent: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as:
informationCollect.usageInfoContent: We automatically collect certain information about your use of our Service:

howWeUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.content: We use the information we collect to:
purposes: Provide, maintain, and improve our Service
Process transactions and send related information
Respond to comments, questions, and customer service requests
Monitor and analyze usage patterns and trends

sharingDisclosure.title: 4. Information Sharing and Disclosure
sharingDisclosure.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except in the following circumstances:
circumstances: Service providers who assist us in operating our platform
Legal compliance and protection of rights

dataSecurity.title: 5. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information:
technicalMeasures: Encryption of data in transit and at rest

dataRetention.title: 6. Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce agreements.
retentionPeriods: Account information: Retained while your account is active
Transaction records: Retained for 7 years for tax and legal purposes

yourRights.title: 7. Your Rights and Choices
yourRights.content: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information:
rights: Access and receive a copy of your personal information
Object to or restrict certain processing activities
Data portability (receive your data in a structured format)

cookies.title: 8. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our platform:
cookieTypes: Essential cookies: Required for basic platform functionality
Performance cookies: Help us understand how you use our service
Functional cookies: Remember your preferences and settings
Marketing cookies: Used to deliver relevant advertisements
cookies.manageCookies: You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings or our cookie preference center.

international.title: 9. International Data Transfers
international.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place:
safeguards: Standard contractual clauses approved by regulatory authorities
Adequacy decisions by relevant data protection authorities
Binding corporate rules for intra-group transfers
Your explicit consent for specific transfers

children.title: 10. Children's Privacy
children.content: Our Service is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we become aware that we have collected personal information from a child under 13, we will take steps to delete such information promptly.

changes.title: 11. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "last updated" date. For material changes, we will provide additional notice through email or prominent website notification.

contact.title: 12. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

acknowledgment.content: By using Syndik, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this Privacy Policy.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Terms & Conditions
terms.readCarefully: Please read these terms carefully before using our service.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Syndik ("we," "our," or "us"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

description.title: 2. Description of Service
description.content: Syndik is a comprehensive SaaS platform designed for residential syndicate management, providing:

userAccounts.title: 3. User Accounts
userAccounts.content: When you create an account with us, you must provide information that is accurate, complete, and current at all times.
responsibilities: Maintain the security of your password
Accept responsibility for all activities under your account
Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use
Do not share your account credentials

acceptableUse.title: 4. Acceptable Use Policy
acceptableUse.content: You may use our service only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms.
prohibited: Violate any applicable federal, state, local, or international law
Transmit any material that is defamatory, offensive, or otherwise objectionable
Interfere with or disrupt the service or servers
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to other accounts

payment.title: 5. Payment and Billing
payment.content: Some services may require payment. Payment terms will be clearly displayed before you make any purchase.
details: All fees are non-refundable except as required by law
You authorize us to charge your payment method
Subscription fees are billed in advance
Price changes will be communicated 30 days in advance

privacy.title: 6. Privacy and Data Protection
privacy.content: Your privacy is important to us. Our Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our service.

intellectualProperty.title: 7. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: The service and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of Syndik and its licensors.

limitationLiability.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
limitationLiability.content: In no event shall Syndik, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages.
limitationLiability.additionalContent: Our total liability to you for any claim arising from these terms or your use of the service shall not exceed the amount you paid us in the twelve months preceding the claim.

termination.title: 9. Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms.

modifications.title: 10. Modifications
modifications.content: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will try to provide at least 30 days notice.

governingLaw.title: 11. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms shall be interpreted and governed by the laws of the jurisdiction in which Syndik operates, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

contact.title: 12. Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us:
contact.address: Syndik Legal Department, 123 Business Street, City, Country

effectiveDate.title: Effective Date:
effectiveDate.content: These terms are effective as of January 1, 2025. By continuing to use Syndik after this date, you agree to be bound by these terms.
